title: Mister Earl Bold
content:
Good Afternoon, can you help me with this incredible old logo?  
What is the font of the "MILETO"?

Thank you very much!

Font: 

 Mister Earl Bold 

Solved By: 

 [oldnick](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130738/http:/typophile.com/user/6470 "View user profile.")

Could be a manually expanded Mister Earl Bold...
